text:
<!here|@here> some updates.  We chipped away at our to do list last week.  priority Next Steps:
- Dennis to reach out to Allie to get the convo going.  Also update her on equipment schedule
- <@U02E3CRMA>  to meet with Leia on staffing the project (allocation requests already in Forecast).  Net out on Team
- <@U0260V4K1> to continue with qDeck
- <@U0260V4K1> to evaluate the brief
- <@U0260V4K1> to review the materials we have available to us
<@U02E3CRMA> to kick off with peter and report back
<@U02E3CRMA> to reach out to Myles and Mike Lee with our dB recco and request access to repo
Dennis to meet with tech and IxD team to figure out if we can create a sketch up mock up of the space

also, 
<@U02E3CRMA> to kick off with peter and report back
<@U02E3CRMA> to reach out to Myles and Mike Lee with our dB recco and request access to repo
 Dennis to meet with tech and IxD team to figure out if we can create a sketch up mock up of the space
curious what felix has to say about their drawing. it looks like they took a tambour door and made a bench out of it
question 1. do they really want to use plywood to sheath it? you'll be able to see all the end ply on the cutouts
question 2. seems like they could rejigger the supporting structure/ribs to hide them beneath the meaty parts of the "g"
I guess that's a statement. whatever
the bench thing thing that has a "g" behind it?
drawings in the google folder you shared out
well they’re not asking us to design or touch the existing strcuture
theyre asking us to map content to the screens
the current ask is: can we recreate the screen set up in sketch up so we can overlay creative mocks
oh so that thing exists already?
I will stop critiquing it then

but josh the way in which youre thinking about it is useful because in addition to creating a sketchup file (which i may ask you to help with still depending on what felix can do) i’m aslo asking you and miguel to help build the analog/prototype in library once we get equipment
so understand how/why its built in MTV is an important part of the process.
